scripts.install-all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.dev:web: concurrently "npm run dev:web:client" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && npm run dev:web:server "
scripts.build:web: npm run build:web:server && npm run build:web:client
scripts.start:web: concurrently  "npm run start:web:client" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && npm run start:web:server "
